payload.html:
Visit
Disneystore.com

Bounce on over to see our exciting selection of March Magic merchandise!

Go to Disneystore.com

Search for

PANDORA Jewelry

Or see results for

Pandora - The World of Avatar

Search for

PANDORA Jewelry

Or see results for

Pandora - The World of Avatar

Safety Recall

Happy Holidays!
Mickey Mouse Nightlight

Guests should immediately remove nightlight from socket and return for a $25.00 refund.

Liquid may leak from product on electrical outlet, causing a potential fire hazard.


UPC: 400009489637
Model Number (located on plug) YF E243438
Tracking Number (rear of nightlight): FAC-019808-16150
The Happy Holidays! Mickey Mouse Nightlight was sold exclusively at Walt Disney World® Resort in Lake Buena Vista, Florida, Disneyland® Resort in Anaheim, California, Shop Disney Parks App, and DisneyStore.com. Retail $14.95.
Contact Walt Disney Parks and Resorts for a refund at 1-844-722-1444.
Select option 3.

Minnie Infant Hoodie Sweatshirt & Mickey Infant Hoodie Sweatshirt

Guests should immediately remove the Infant Hoodie Sweatshirt from child and return for a $40.00 refund.

SKU(s): (6M) 400000175669, (12M) 400000175676, (18M) 400000175683, (24M) 400000175690
FAC-010635-16015, FAC-010635-16194
SKU(s): (6M) 400000145433, (12M) 400000145440, (18M) 400000145457, (24M) 400000145464
FAC-010635-16015, FAC-010635-16220, FAC-010635-16280
The infant hoodie sweatshirts were sold exclusively at Walt Disney World® Resort in Lake Buena Vista, Florida; Disneyland® Resort in Anaheim, California; and Shop Disney Parks APP. Retail $29.95.

The snap(s) may detach from the infant hoodie sweatshirts causing a small part choking hazard.
Contact Walt Disney Parks and Resorts for a refund at 1-844-722-1444.
Select option 2.
Walt Disney Parks and Resorts • Lake Buena Vista, FL 32830
This recall is being conducted in cooperation with the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission.
Post until 6/29/2017
www.waltdisneyworld.com

©Disney

payload.title: Enjoying This App?
payload.content: We Would love to hear your feedback. Would you like to rate this app now?

payload.title: Update Available
payload.content: Some Guests using iOS 8 may have trouble completing their order with the Order Now option. If you encounter this issue, you can order by tapping the Review & Purchase button after adding your items to the bag. For a better experience, please update your device’s operating system.

payload.title: [TEST] Update Available
payload.content: Guests using an older version of the app may not be able to view certain promotional details. Download the latest version for the best experience. On this version, you can visit the Review & Purchase screen for more information about individual promotions.

payload.html:
Can you find our Tricks and Treats?

Special promotions are hidden throughout the app for this occassion.
Make sure you find them before they disappear.*

Start Shopping
